name: SportSetter
overview:
It all started on paddle-boards off the coast of Miami. Two old college friends, reunited from their respective sides of the Atlantic, realized that staying healthy could mean more than the non-stop treadmill of gyms and jogging. It could be different, it could be exciting. It didn’t have to be so… lame.

That first “board meeting” led to the birth of SportSetter, which helps people discover great sports, health and wellness services, and helps these services meet customers on the lookout for something new. It’s not just about fitness, but about making fitness fun – by exploring, trying new things, and teaming up with friends.

Based out of Miami and Helsinki, co-founders Trevor and Niko combined their backgrounds in software and sales, and finance and marketing, and left their corporate careers to live out a passion for sports and adventure.

Currently available in Helsinki, and soon in New York and beyond, SportSetter is here to help you give your life a shake. With unbeatable services, value and variety – and fun, if we haven’t mentioned it enough already – we want to make fitness fit your life. No pressure, just something new to try.

So no matter what kind of shape you’re in, if you’ve got an interest in getting fit, we’ll bring the inspiration. Let’s break our routines together.
